sections.Trivia:
- There is an error in this episode: when the victim slips on a bottle of alcohol in Kogoro's scenario, he is wearing white socks, but when he is falling off his balcony in the very next shot, his socks are black.
- Inspector Megure tells Junko Miyoshi that Division Three will be in contact with her soon regarding the thefts that took place in her apartment. Division Three focuses on robberies and is the division that Inspector Momose belongs to.
